price: Nuti moggaa mirga (gaara) Xuur irraa isatti lallabnee, maqoo itti haasa’uunis (of itti) isa dhiheessine!
arabic: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wanādaynāhu min jānibi al-ṭūri al-aymani waqarrabnāhu najiyyan
